item.stepcrafter.step_crafter.help: Accepts patterns for recursive autocrafting and allows setting minimum and maximum thresholds. When the output of a configured pattern falls below the minimum in the network, it will automatically craft items up to the maximum.
item.stepcrafter.step_requester.help: When a configured resource drops below its configurable minimum, it requests autocrafters to produce it in the configurable batch size until the configurable maximum is reached.
item.stepcrafter.step_crafter_manager.he: Allows managing all your step crafters from a single interface.
Allows managing all your step requester from a single interface.
gui.stepcrafter.step_crafter.filter_help: The pattern that should be recursively followed to keep them in stock
gui.stepcrafter.step_requester.filter_he: The resources that should be requested to Autocrafters to keep them in stock
gui.stepcrafter.step_crafter.visible_to_: Visible to the Step Crafter Manager
If this is enabled, you will be able to manage this step crafter in the Step Crafter Manager.
Visible to the Step Requester Manager
If this is enabled, you will be able to manage this step requester in the Step Requester Manager.
text.autoconfig.stepcrafter.option.stepC: The energy used by the Step Crafter.
The speed multiplier per slot upgrade by the Step Crafter. Formula: <SpeedUpgradeAmount> * <SpeedMultiplier> + 1
text.autoconfig.stepcrafter.option.stepR: The energy used by the Step Requester.
text.autoconfig.stepcrafter.option.stepC: The energy used by the Step Crafter Manager.
text.autoconfig.stepcrafter.option.stepR: The energy used by the Step Requester Manager.
text.autoconfig.stepcrafter.option.slotU: The energy used by the Slot Upgrade.
